entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Grand Falls-Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Badger 07:30 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -18.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Dewpoint: -20.7°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15 except minus 22 in low lying areas. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15 except minus 22 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
